title: ### Studio # Fully Furnished #All Charges Included#
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Furnished 18sqm Studio for rent.
Convertible Bed, Furnished Kitchen with Fridge, Gas Oven, Microwave, Coffee Machine and Utensils, Bathroom with Shower, 
Washing Machine, Air Conditioner, Electric Heater and a Vacuum Cleaner.
Cable TV, Internet, wi-fi.
Lots of Storage Space!
5 minutes from Gare St Lazare, Printemps, Galeries Lafayette, Monoprix, the Opera.
The center of Paris.
Metro Saint Lazare or Havre-Caumartin.
Ideal for one person. 
All Charges included (Gas,Electric,Water,Cable)
Refundable 1 month security deposit.
No agency fee.
No Caf.
